div.p: After having checked out the various modules, you can build Mevenide trhough the master project. The maven.xml master script defines, amongst other, the following goals :

ul.li: mevenide:build-all builds all modules and attains the mevenide:create-update-dist which in turns uses the maven-eclipse-plugin-plugin to generate the eclipse artifacts. Please refer to the MEP Plugin documentation for more informations about this plugin.
mevenide:build-site builds the aggregated documentation site for Mevenide.

div.p: The various plugins and features can be found under eclipse-update/target/eclipse/dist/
